---

# Agent Guidelines

See [AGENTS.md](../../AGENTS.md) for code style rules and guidelines for AI agents working on this codebase.

# Testing

Use VS Code's Test Explorer (Ctrl+Shift+T) for running tests. Prefer Test Explorer over terminal commands.

# Python Environment

- Virtual environment: `.venv`
- Activate before running commands: `source .venv/bin/activate`
- Package manager: `uv`
